titlealts.searchtitle: Data Element: RETINOPATHY OF PREMATURITY SCREENING PERFORMED INDICATOR - Description

body.p: RETINOPATHY OF PREMATURITY SCREENING PERFORMED INDICATOR is the same as attribute PATIENT PROCEDURE PERFORMED INDICATOR .
For the National Neonatal Data Set - Episodic and Daily Care , RETINOPATHY OF PREMATURITY SCREENING PERFORMED INDICATOR may indicate either that:

div.p: the baby had Retinopathy of Prematurity Screening during the NEONATAL CRITICAL CARE DAILY CARE DATE when present in the Daily Care section; or
the baby had Retinopathy of Prematurity Screening at any time during the neonatal CRITICAL CARE PERIOD , when present in the Retinopathy of Prematurity Screening (Episodic) section.
